text: athavā, sr̥ṣṭi ārambhikkukayuṁ pinnīṭ at āvarttikkukayuṁ, ākāśattu ninnuṁ bhūmiyil ninnuṁ niṅṅaḷkk upajīvanaṁ nalkukayuṁ ceyyunnavanēā? (atalla, avaruṭe daivaṅṅaḷēā?) allāhuvēāṭeāppaṁ vēṟe valla daivavumuṇṭēā? (nabiyē,) paṟayuka: niṅṅaḷ satyavānmārāṇeṅkil niṅṅaḷkkuḷḷa teḷiv niṅṅaḷ keāṇṭ varika
